channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I don’t own a house’: I’m 50 with $2 million and I’m scared about losing my job. Can I retire early?
item.description: “My monthly expenses are around $6,000. That includes rent.”

item.title: Gold’s searing run halted, silver briefly drops below $100 as Warsh nomination to Fed hits dollar debasement trade
item.description: A selloff is underway for gold, silver and copper on Friday, as the dollar rises on expectations that Kevin Warsh will be the next Federal Reserve cha...

item.title: I’m afraid a bridesmaid will drop out of a bachelorette party and leave us on the hook. How can I avoid this?
item.description: “She has a history of not respecting other people’s time or money.”

item.title: Top investors for the first time say they’re putting more of their money into quant funds than any other type of hedge fund
item.description: The last five years has seen interest rates rise materially and this has created more dispersion across asset class returns, much to the benefit of he...

item.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
item.description: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

item.title: Trump finally makes his Fed chair pick — What Kevin Warsh means for investors
item.description: Investors see the former Fed governor as a credible steward of monetary policy despite expectations he may push for lower rates.

item.title: A derivative winner from the blockbuster gold rally: pawn shop stocks
item.description: Pawn shops are getting a boost as gold trades at record highs, and analysts expect gains.

item.title: Sandisk gets upgrade from Raymond James after blockbuster earnings
item.description: Key catalysts, including the potential for more price hikes, are driving analyst Jason Bazinet’s upgrade.

item.title: Apple’s iPhone sales surge gives analysts something to cheer, but memory concerns weigh on outlooks
item.description: Analysts were divided over the impact an AI-driven memory shortage, causing a surge in memory prices, will have on the company.

item.title: This Microsoft options trade creates an income stream while awaiting a snapback
item.description: Microsoft's stock tumbled 12.5% to a low print of the day of $421 on Thursday, slicing off more than $400 billion in market value.

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...
